metadata.title: Privacy Policy
metadata.description: Learn how KDP Toolkit collects, uses, and protects your personal information.

introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.content: KDP Toolkit is committed to protecting your privacy. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard your information when you visit our website.

dataCollection.title: Information We Collect
dataCollection.intro: We may collect information about you in a variety of ways:

items.analytics: Analytics data (page views, referrers, device type) via Plausible Analytics
items.newsletter: Email address and name (optional) when you subscribe to our newsletter
items.comments: GitHub username when you comment via Giscus
items.cookies: Minimal cookies for essential site functionality and theme preferences

dataUsage.title: How We Use Your Information
dataUsage.intro: We use the information we collect to:

items.newsletter: Send you our newsletter (if you subscribed)
items.analytics: Understand how visitors use our site

thirdParty.title: Third-Party Services
thirdParty.intro: We use the following third-party services:

items.giscus: Comment system powered by GitHub Discussions
items.adsense: Advertising (may use cookies for ad targeting)

cookies.title: Cookies
cookies.content: We use minimal cookies primarily for remembering your theme preference (dark/light mode). Third-party services like Google AdSense may use cookies for advertising purposes.

items.access: Access the personal information we hold about you
items.optOut: Opt-out of newsletter communications at any time

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.content: If you have questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us through our contact form.

content.accuracy: While we strive to provide accurate information, we make no warranties about the completeness, reliability, or accuracy of the information on our site.

intellectualProperty.content: The content, organization, graphics, design, and other matters related to KDP Toolkit are protected under applicable copyrights and other proprietary laws. Copying, redistribution, or use of any materials without our express written permission is prohibited.

affiliateLinks.content: This site contains affiliate links. When you click on these links and make a purchase, we may earn a commission at no additional cost to you. See our Affiliate Disclosure for more details.

contact.content: If you have any questions about these Terms of Service, please contact us through our contact form.

metadata.title: Affiliate Disclosure
metadata.description: Transparency about affiliate relationships and compensation on KDP Toolkit.

overview.title: Overview
overview.content: KDP Toolkit participates in various affiliate marketing programs, which means we may earn commissions on purchases made through links on this site. This disclosure is required by the Federal Trade Commission (FTC) and is provided in the interest of full transparency.

whatAreAffiliateLinks.title: What Are Affiliate Links?
whatAreAffiliateLinks.content: Affiliate links are special tracking links that allow us to earn a commission when you click on them and make a purchase. These commissions come at no additional cost to you and help support the operation of this site.

programs.title: Affiliate Programs
programs.intro: We participate in affiliate programs for the following services:

items.amazon: Amazon Associates program for books and publishing-related products
items.others: Other KDP and publishing-related tools and services

recommendations.title: Our Recommendations
recommendations.content: We only recommend tools and services that we have personally used, tested, or thoroughly researched. Our reviews are honest and based on real experience, regardless of affiliate relationships. We will clearly identify when products are recommended based on research rather than personal use.

advertising.title: Advertising
advertising.content: In addition to affiliate links, we may display advertising through Google AdSense or other advertising networks. These ads may be based on your browsing history and interests.

transparency.title: Our Commitment to Transparency
transparency.content: We believe in complete transparency. When an article contains affiliate links, we will clearly disclose this at the beginning of the article. Our goal is to provide valuable, honest information while maintaining the financial support needed to operate this site.

ftc.title: FTC Compliance
ftc.content: This disclosure complies with the Federal Trade Commission's 16 CFR Part 255: Guides Concerning the Use of Endorsements and Testimonials in Advertising.

contact.title: Questions
contact.content: If you have any questions about our affiliate relationships or this disclosure, please contact us through our contact form.
